name: Supreme Saberman: 3D War Zone
description:
INTRODUCTION

Supreme Saberman is fun, gentle and equally attractive stickman fighting 3D game. With extremely simple game mechanic, you can control your warrior to defeat your enemy easily.

Coming to this lightsaber stickman 3D game you will become a Supreme Saberman to fight, eliminate enemy and evil monsters in the universe to protect your planet.

You are a fan of stickman 3D game or extremely popular anime series. You are looking for a game that allows your hero to transform into your favorite hero. Well, this is the stickman 3D game you look.

In Supreme Saberman: you will experience becoming a true warrior, you will stand between the boundary of victory and defeat, become either a winner or a loser.

HOW TO PLAY

With Supreme Saberman you only need to use basic game mechanic to be able to control the accuracy of each Supreme Saberman's fight to deal huge damage to the monster. Use the shield to help your warrior defend against those huge amount of damage from the monster. In addition, there are a number of other buffs that make the warrior stronger to quickly defeat the enemy.

Use resources and energy accumulated through stick fight with monster to upgrade strength, unlock lightsaber weapons and shields that help the stickman warrior become stronger. With this, the Supreme Saberman can defeat all monster and gain more resources. In addition, you can also upgrade to a new source of power to help the Supreme Saberman becomes more and more powerful and possesses an extremely attractive warrior.

FEATURES

Simple but addictive
With a simple style of play by choosing the center point when the clock hand runs back and forth where the Supreme Saberman can cause the greatest damage. And use the other support to help lightsaber stickman hero smoothly defeat the enemy.

Attractive Hero
With 100 attractive skin and extremely familiar to your like Captain stickman, iron stickman, SS Dragon stickman, ...
Thousands of new power with different looks and effects are waiting for your stickman hero to upgrade

Increase power
The lightsaber stickman warrior meet a enemy that is too strong and can not defeat? Increase the power and health of your stickman warrior to better withstand and deal greater damage to enemy. Also, upgrade lightsaber weapon and shield to make your Supreme Saberman stronger
Upgrade new power and skin to make your stickman warrior stronger and more attractive

Relax and fun
with beautiful 3D graphics and vivid sound, Supreme Saberman will give you wonderful relaxing moments

Supreme Saberman

Break through levels to collect beautiful supreme skins
Stick fight to accumulate the keys to unlock the most powerful lightsaber weapon
You can stick fight with the monster to collect spin, which helps unlock the best shields so Supreme Saberman can block all the damage from monster

Energy can be collected by making your stickman hero stick fight and destroy the monster. Energy will help your hero upgrade to supreme sources of power.

With mutiple camera for you to experience Supreme Saberman better
Lightsaber stickman hero can use supports like to shield to block damage from monster, strength to increase the power of the next attack, health to heal

Use the money gained from stick fight with enemy to upgrade the blood and power of the stickman warrior to quickly possess the ultimate power to overcome all enemy


Start represent your planet to become the Supreme hero to fight against all evil monster with the SUPREME SABERMAN – LIGHTSABER STICKMAN 3D!
